BBK#4 Find Middle Element

can you make it clean?

fun getMiddle(word : String) : String {
	val chars = word.toCharArray()
	val mid = chars.size/2
	return  if(chars.size%2==0){
	    "${chars.get(mid-1)}${chars.get(mid)}"
	}else{
	    "${chars.get(mid)}"
    }
}
